org.project

Class Tokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.project.Tokenizer

  • public final class Tokenizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a wrapper that contain a tokenizer ("core NLP") from the package edu.stanford.mlp.pipeline. It allows to tokenize a given string of text into its words. If needed, it checks the presence of punctuation and common words, eventually returning a lexically/frequency ordered version to iterate through.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean checks
      Enables class methods to take punctuation and current words into account.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> commonWords
      Allows the methods to know which words should be considered when checking for common words.
      private java.lang.String FILENAME
      Contains the file where commonWords are stored.
      private edu.stanford.nlp.pipeline.StanfordCoreNLP pipeline
      Pipeline which divides the text processing into phases (here only one is used).
      private java.lang.String REGEX
      Contains the regex for common punctuation plus few more characters that are used to split the tokens (see TreeStorage.getOrderedTokens(int)).
      private TokensStorage storage
      Stores the tokens and is capable of returning them in an ordered set.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Tokenizer(boolean checks, TokensStorage storage)
      This constructor is used to set: whether to do checks on the tokens or not (checks); common word (commonWords); the pipeline (pipeline); the storage class storage.

      This method is used by this class to insert tokens in the storage.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tokenizer

        public Tokenizer(boolean checks,
                 TokensStorage storage)
        This constructor is used to set: whether to do checks on the tokens or not (checks); common word (commonWords); the pipeline (pipeline); the storage class storage.
        Parameters:
        checks - checks if there are common words or punctuation in the tokens.
        storage - a structure capable of storing tokens or returning them in an ordered set.

    • Method Detail

      • tokenize

        public void tokenize(java.lang.String str,
                     java.util.List<java.lang.String> searched)
        This method is used by this class to insert tokens in the storage.
        Parameters:
        str - which is the string containing text to add to the class variable to obtain a bigger set of tokens.
        searched - which is a list of all the queries not to check on when check is activated.
